body:
Declare @UTSiparisID Int, @FaturaBolumID Int, @SiparisTurID Int, @MusSiparisGrupID Int
Declare csnp Cursor Local For
Select  USM.UTSiparisID, USM.MusteriSiparisGrupID, USM.SiparisTurID
From    IT04_UTSiparisM USM
Where   USM.MusteriSiparisGrupID = 5 And USM.FaturaBolumID Is Null
Open csnp
Fetch Next From csnp
Into @UTSiparisID, @MusSiparisGrupID, @SiparisTurID
While @@FETCH_STATUS = 0 Begin

    Select  @FaturaBolumID = FB.FaturaBolumID
    From    IT15_System_FaturaBolumleri FB
    Where   FB.SiparisTurID = @SiparisTurID And FB.MusSiparisGrupID = @MusSiparisGrupID

    Update  IT04_UTSiparisM
    Set     FaturaBolumID = @FaturaBolumID,
            IsITUpdate = IsITUpdate
    Where   UTSiparisID = @UTSiparisID

    Fetch Next From csnp
    Into @UTSiparisID, @MusSiparisGrupID, @SiparisTurID
End
Close csnp
Deallocate csnp
